services_intro: All our services guarantee you solutions for all areas of e-commerce

storage_and_packaging.title: Storage and Packaging
storage_and_packaging.desc: We provide you with secure and equipped storage spaces to keep your products in perfect condition, with smart inventory management that ensures continuous quantity updates. We also offer professional packaging services according to the highest standards, to ensure that orders reach your customers with high quality and a distinctive unboxing experience. In addition, you can rely on our private warehouses available 24/7 to store and manage your products with ease and security.

customer_service.title: Customer Contact Service
customer_service.desc: Customer support is a key element in the success of any online store, so we provide you with a specialized team to respond to customer inquiries, handle their requests and problems quickly and professionally, helping you build a strong relationship with your customers and increase loyalty and repeat purchase rates.

fast_shipping.title: Fast Shipping and Delivery to Ensure a
fast_shipping.desc: We guarantee you fast and reliable shipping services in cooperation with the best delivery companies, ensuring that orders reach your customers on time and in excellent condition, enhancing customer satisfaction and reducing return rates.

profit_collection.title: Profit Collection and Transfer Within
profit_collection.desc: No need to wait long to receive your profits! With Makhzon, we guarantee the collection and transfer of your profits within 24 hours only, giving you a fast cash flow to support your expansion and business growth without any delay. With more than 10 different payment methods, including bank transfers, e-wallets, and payment cards, giving you complete flexibility in receiving your profits in the way that suits you.

product_import_and_quality_check.title: Product Import and Quality Check with
product_import_and_quality_check.desc: We help you search for trending products and import them at the best prices, with a thorough quality check before shipping them to your warehouses, ensuring you offer reliable products that maintain your store's reputation and enhance customer trust.

additional_inventory_services.title: Additional Inventory Services
additional_inventory_services.desc: We provide you with additional services such as funding (Fund) that allows you to get products now and pay later after achieving sales, helping you grow your business without the need for a large initial investment. And providing a Visa that facilitates online payment, so you can grow your e-business without financial constraints.

detailed_reports.title: Detailed Reports to Follow and Analyze
detailed_reports.desc: Through the dashboard, you can access accurate reports about your inventory, including sorting details and available quantities, in addition to sales performance and return rates. This data helps you make smart decisions to improve your operations and increase your profits.

call_center_service.title: Make your brand shine with a distinguished call center service that ensures
call_center_service.description: We provide you with direct communication with your customers to ensure their ideal experience and resolve any inquiries or issues quickly and efficiently, enhancing the level of service and increasing customer satisfaction. We are here to bring you closer to success step by step.

about_us.title1: Makhzon is your ideal partner in

telesales.description: Your potential customers are waiting for someone to convince them! Our professional telesales team works to follow up with potential customers and motivate them to complete purchases, which means increased conversion rates and faster profit growth.

reports_analysis.description: At Makhzon, we provide you with accurate reports and analytics that give you a clear view of customer service performance, helping you improve processes, reduce errors, and increase customer satisfaction.

flexible_solutions.title: Flexible solutions that suit
flexible_solutions.description: We understand that every business needs flexible and customizable services, which is why we provide you with integrated call center solutions that adapt to the size of your business and your unique requirements.

faqs_fullfillment.question: Do I need a large capital to benefit from Makhzon services?
faqs_fullfillment.answer: We provide secure and flexible storage services with unlimited space, meaning you won't have to rent warehouses or deal with operational and administrative costs. We take care of all storage, management, and inventory details, allowing you to focus on marketing and sales while we efficiently and quickly fulfill your orders.

faqs_fullfillment.question: What is the shipping and delivery speed with Makhzon?
faqs_fullfillment.answer: We work with top shipping companies to ensure fast and secure delivery, with options for same-day delivery or within 24-48 hours in major cities.

faqs_fullfillment.question: In which countries can I store with Makhzon?
faqs_fullfillment.answer: We currently provide storage services in the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Jordan, and Oman, with plans to expand soon to more countries to support your e-commerce growth.

faqs_fullfillment.question: How can I receive my earnings, and what are the available payment methods?
faqs_fullfillment.answer: Earnings are transferred within 24 hours of submitting a withdrawal request. Transfers can be made through more than 10 methods, including bank transfers, e-wallets, bank cards, and digital payment services, ensuring you flexibility and ease in receiving your funds.

faqs_fullfillment.question: Why should I choose Makhzon instead of managing order fulfillment myself?
faqs_fullfillment.answer: With Makhzon, we save you time, effort, and costs through integrated solutions that ensure faster fulfillment, higher customer satisfaction, and increased profits without the need to operate warehouses or hire logistics teams.

faqs_callcenter.question: What services are included in the call center service?
faqs_callcenter.answer: Call reception, responding to customer inquiries, order processing and tracking, resolving issues and complaints, making sales calls, and providing performance and call reports.

faqs_callcenter.question: Can I track call performance and measure customer satisfaction?
faqs_callcenter.answer: Absolutely! We provide you with detailed reports through a professional dashboard, allowing you to monitor your call center team's performance and measure customer satisfaction.

faqs_callcenter.question: How can I subscribe to the service?
faqs_callcenter.answer: Contact us now, and we will help you set up a professional call center that represents your company in the best possible way.

faqs_export.question: Do I need a large capital to import via Makhzon?
faqs_export.answer: Not necessarily! You can purchase small quantities or take advantage of financing options we offer, allowing you to import products without a large initial investment.

faqs_export.question: What is the shipping and delivery speed with Makhzon?
faqs_export.answer: We work with top shipping companies to ensure fast and secure delivery.

faqs_export.question: From which countries can I import via Makhzon?
faqs_export.answer: Currently, we offer imports from China and Turkey, with shipping and customs clearance available in the UAE and Saudi Arabia.

faqs_export.question: Why should I choose Makhzon instead of dealing directly with suppliers?
faqs_export.answer: With Makhzon, we provide secure transactions, quality assurance, competitive pricing, and smooth shipping procedures, allowing you to focus on selling your products instead of dealing with the complexities of shipping and importing.

faqs.question: Do I need capital to start my business?
faqs.answer: No, you can start without capital through the dropshipping model or by using product financing services from Makhzon, helping you grow without a large initial investment.

faqs.question: How can I receive my profits with Makhzon?
faqs.answer: Your profits are easily transferred through your bank account or e-wallet, and we also provide cash-on-delivery (COD) options for greater flexibility.

faqs.question: Can I sell products if I am outside the Gulf countries?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can sell products from anywhere in the world, and Makhzon supports international shipping and distribution, making it easy for you to deliver your products to target markets.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum limit for withdrawing profits?
faqs.answer: There is no strict minimum limit, but some conditions may depend on the transfer method and the bank or e-wallet used. For more details, you can contact support.

faqs.question: Which countries does the Makhzon platform support?
faqs.answer: The Makhzon platform supports most Gulf countries, including Saudi Arabia, the UAE, Kuwait, Bahrain, Qatar, and Oman. We are also working on expanding internationally to support new markets soon.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum limit for withdrawing profits?
faqs.answer: There is no strict minimum limit, but some conditions may depend on the transfer method and the bank or e-wallet used. For more details, you can contact support.

faqs.question: Which countries does the Makhzon platform support?
faqs.answer: The Makhzon platform supports most Gulf countries, including Saudi Arabia, the UAE, Kuwait, Bahrain, Qatar, and Oman. We are also working on expanding internationally to support new markets soon.

about-us.title: About Us
about-us.success_message: Makhzon is your place to achieve success in
about-us.platform_description: An integrated platform for e-commerce and dropshipping, aiming to provide innovative and easy solutions for shoppers and entrepreneurs in the Middle East. Makhzon was founded to facilitate the process of selling products online by providing unique products, excellent logistics services, and comprehensive support for entrepreneurs and online store owners.
about-us.technical_support_description: Innovative technical support, always by your side to ensure your work runs smoothly and efficiently. We are here to turn every technical challenge into an opportunity for success.
about-us.financial_security_description: We provide you with a secure financial experience, ensuring high-quality products and continuous follow-up on your accounts to guarantee increased profits.
about-us.comprehensive_services: We provide you with all services related to e-commerce, from product management to customer follow-up to ensure the success of your business.
